name: yield_management
description: A prompt for managing the Talos yield.
template: The current price of the Talos token is {price}, the 24-hour change is {change}, and the 24-hour volume is {volume}. The current sentiment of the Talos protocol on Twitter is {sentiment}. Should the APR of the staking for the Talos protocol be adjusted? If so, what should the new APR be?
